channel.title: Map Image Help: Mapback changed but the shape is still there
channel.description:
[img]http://img27.imageshack.us/img27/5596/83129087.png[/img]
as you can see, i got the mapback 0 to change... but now i cant fix the actual map to be the same shape. does anyone know what file i need to edit? i think its in class30_sub2_sub1_sub1 file, but i have no idea where and how to change it, can anyone help me out
